category.title: Cold Sandwhiches
category.description: All Sandwiches are served with house made chips, pickles and our signature sauce. Substitute house made chips for fries $2.00 or sweet potato fries for $2.50 or onion rings for $2.50

meals.title: So. Cal
meals.description: House roasted turkey, bacon, avocado, mojo mustard on a brioche bun.

meals.title: Ham & Cheese Triple Decker
meals.description: Our Triple decker sandwich is made with ham, cheese, apple wood-smoked bacon, mayo, lettuce and tomatoes on a scali bread.

meals.title: Avocado Turkey Club
meals.description: Our Triple decker sandwich made with turkey, fresh avocado, apple wood-smoked bacon, mayo, lettuce and tomatoes on a scali bread.

meals.title: New Yorker Triple Decker
meals.description: Our triple decker Sandwich made with House made, sliced apple, roasted turkey, virginia ham, sliced tomatoes, lettuce, apple wood-smoked bacon and mayo served on a scali bread.

meals.title: Buffalo Chicken Wrap

meals.title: Greek Wrap
